item.title: CVE-2024-24850|2024-03-21T17:49:24.197Z -- Mark Stockton -- Quicksand Post Filter jQuery Plugin
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Mark Stockton Quicksand Post Filter jQuery Plugin.This issue affects Quicksand Post Filter jQuery Plugin: from n/a through 3.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-24849|2024-02-21T07:04:20.233Z -- Mark Stockton -- Quicksand Post Filter jQuery Plugin
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Mark Stockton Quicksand Post Filter jQuery Plugin.This issue affects Quicksand Post Filter jQuery Plugin: from n/a through 3.1.1.
